pre_caption: From a high-angle, first-person perspective, the tip of a snowboard occupies the bottom foreground, initially positioned slightly left of center. The snowboarder's shadow is cast into the bottom right foreground. The vast, snowy slope fills the majority of the frame, extending from the foreground into the middle ground, where a single track is visible in the center-left. In the background, large, snow-covered mountains are visible across the top of the frame. As the camera moves forward and down the slope, the snowboard shifts toward the bottom center of the frame, gliding past a rocky outcrop located in the right middle ground.
